title: Normal Notation
question_text:
Distribution $A$ is $N(28,1.2)$.
Distribution $B$ is $N(25, 1.8)$.
Which of the following statements is true?

choices.text:
Distribution
A
has a population of
28
individuals and a mean of
1.2
, while Distribution
B
has a population of
25
individuals with a mean of
1.8
.

Distribution
A
has a higher mean and a lower standard deviation than Distribution
B
.

Distribution
A
has a lower mean and a higher standard deviation than Distribution
B
.

Distribution
A
has a higher mean and a higher variance than Distribution
B
.

Distribution
A
has a lower mean and a lower variance than Distribution
B
.
